statements: SELECT * FROM reports
SELECT customer_id, delivery_performance_rating FROM reports WHERE delivery_date = '2022-10-15'
SELECT delivery_date, customer_satisfaction_rating FROM reports WHERE customer_id = 101
SELECT * FROM reports ORDER BY delivery_date DESC LIMIT 3
SELECT report_id, delivery_date, customer_satisfaction_rating FROM reports WHERE delivery_performance_rating > 4 ORDER BY customer_id ASC
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE delivery_performance_rating > 4 ORDER BY delivery_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, AVG(customer_satisfaction_rating) AS avg_satisfaction FROM reports GROUP BY customer_id HAVING AVG(customer_satisfaction_rating) > 3;
SELECT report_id, MAX(delivery_performance_rating) AS max_rating FROM reports WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(report_id) AS report_count FROM reports GROUP BY customer_id ORDER BY report_count DESC;
SELECT * FROM reports WHERE customer_id = 101 AND delivery_performance_rating < 3;
SELECT * FROM delivery_performance;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM delivery_performance WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT customer_id, delivery_date FROM delivery_performance WHERE customer_id = 1001;
SELECT satisfaction_id, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_satisfaction ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date, delivery_status, customer_id FROM delivery_performance WHERE delivery_status = 'In Transit' ORDER BY delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_performance WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_date FROM delivery_performance WHERE delivery_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-01-31';
SELECT dp.delivery_id, dp.delivery_date, cs.satisfaction_rating FROM delivery_performance dp JOIN customer_satisfaction cs ON dp.customer_id = cs.customer_id;
SELECT AVG(cs.satisfaction_rating) AS avg_rating FROM customer_satisfaction cs;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_status, feedback FROM delivery_performance dp LEFT JOIN customer_satisfaction cs ON dp.customer_id = cs.customer_id;
SELECT * FROM delivery_reports;
SELECT customer_id, delivery_status FROM delivery_reports WHERE delivery_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT DISTINCT delivery_status FROM delivery_reports ORDER BY delivery_status DESC;
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_time, delivery_location FROM delivery_performance WHERE delivery_time BETWEEN '2022-01-01 00:00:00' AND '2022-12-31 23:59:59';
SELECT * FROM delivery_reports ORDER BY delivery_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, delivery_status FROM delivery_reports WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT customer_id, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4 ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC;
SELECT delivery_id, delivery_location FROM delivery_performance WHERE delivery_time >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY delivery_time ASC;
SELECT satisfaction_rating, feedback FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE feedback IS NOT NULL ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM delivery_performance_reports ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT report_id, delivery_date, delivery_time FROM delivery_performance_reports WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered';
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT agent_id, agent_name, location FROM delivery_agents WHERE agent_phone LIKE '%123%';
SELECT * FROM customer_satisfaction_reports ORDER BY satisfaction_rating DESC, survey_id ASC;
SELECT * FROM delivery_performance_reports;
SELECT report_id, delivery_date FROM delivery_performance_reports WHERE delivery_status = 'delivered' ORDER BY delivery_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, customer_address FROM customers JOIN delivery_agents ON customers.customer_id = delivery_agents.customer_id WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT agent_name, agent_phone FROM delivery_agents WHERE agent_id IN (SELECT agent_id FROM delivery_performance_reports WHERE delivery_status = 'pending');
SELECT customer_name, customer_email FROM customers WHERE customer_id IN (SELECT customer_id FROM customer_satisfaction_reports WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4) ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM customer_details;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT employee_id, employee_name, department FROM delivery_employees ORDER BY department;
SELECT route_id, start_location, end_location, distance_km FROM delivery_routes WHERE distance_km > 50;
SELECT report_id, delivery_date, delivery_status FROM delivery_performance_reports WHERE delivery_status = 'Delayed';
SELECT * FROM customer_details WHERE customer_id = 1;
SELECT customer_name, address FROM customer_details ORDER BY customer_name DESC;
SELECT employee_name, department FROM delivery_employees WHERE employee_role = 'Driver';
SELECT report_id, satisfaction_rating FROM customer_satisfaction_reports WHERE satisfaction_rating > 4;
SELECT delivery_date, delivery_time, delivery_status FROM delivery_performance_reports WHERE delivery_status = 'Delayed';
